TaskStatueSearchParameter

Parameter Task.status:token

Searches for FhirTask based on the FhirTask status eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Task?status={codeable concept}

ResourceTask
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesTask
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: TaskStatueSearchParameter
description: Searches for FhirTask based on the FhirTask status eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Task?status={codeable concept}
